import React from "react"; export default function TodoList({ todos, nbCompleted , deleteTodo, completeTodo }) { const unCompleted = todos.filter(todo => !todo.completed) return (
    {todos.map((todo, index) => (
  • {todo}
    • deleteTodo(index)} >
    ))}
    {unCompleted} items left
    • All
    • Active
    • Completed
    Clear completed
); }
